question:
10. The number before one hundred and one is ...    A. One hundred
C. One hundred and two
B. One thousand
D. One thousand and two​

answers.answer:
A. one hundred

( angka sebelum 101 adalah 100 )

semoga membantu.

related_questions.question:
11.Nanda and her brother ... at five o'clock every morning.    a. woke up
b. wake up
c. waking up
12. The students ... study online in 2019.
a. Do not
b. did not
c. were not
13. Junercho ... the film until 10 pm every night
a. Watches
b. watch
C. watched
14. Dewa wanted to be a teacher when he ... a child.
b. do
c. am
15. Does your father ... to work early in the morning?
a. go
b. went
C. gone
16.Tiger and lion ... the heaviest land animal.
a. is not
b. are not
C. do not
a. was​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

11. B. Wake up.

12. A. Do not.

13. A. Watches.

14. Was.

15. A. Go.

16. B. Are not.

Penjelasan:

Nomor 11-16 menggunakan kalimat Simple Present Tense, kecuali nomor 14 menggunakan kalimat Simple Past Tense.

Semoga membantu ^_^

related_questions.question:
19. Indri    Sinta : Today is September 9.
Indri : I see, thanks
a. What day is it today? c. Is today the September 9?
b. What date is it today? d. When will we leave?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

B. What date is it today?

Penjelasan: Date biasa digunakan jika jawaban memiliki angka seperti: Desember 4

Day biasa digunakan jika jawaban hanya memiliki hari tidak ada angka seperti: Friday

Jawaban:

a. What day is it today?

maaf kalo salah

related_questions.question:
9. There are 3 books in my bag (+)
# there
3 books in my bag (-)​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

9. (+) There are 3 books in my bag.

(-) There are not 3 books in my bag.

(?) Are there 3 books in my bag?

related_questions.question: Bantu jawab plis pelajaran bhs inggris ​

13. Lani    : Lara, your bag is cool. It has simple design but luxurious. It's awesome.
Lara : Thanks. My father bought it for me yesterday,
From the dialog we know that ...
A. Lara's bag is new
B. Lani dislikes the bag
C. the bag is expensive
D. Lara bought the bag yesterday.​

What do the snakes do...?
a.slither
b.move
c.walk
d.slide​

answers.answer:
A. SLITHER

Penjelasan

Slither: merayap atau melata(karena ular tidak mempunyai kaki)

Move: pindah

Walk: Berjalan ( gak ada kakinya)

Slide: meluncur (kurang tepat)

JADIKAN JAWABAN TERBAIK JIKA ANDA MERASA TERBANTU✨

related_questions.question:
3. They ____ studying for the test two days ago    a. was
b. were
c. do
d. Does
4. Dudi _____ optimistic about the project yesterday.
a. war
b. wer
c. do
d. does

bantu jawab lagi kakak Besok ujian saya mau di kumpul​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Jawabannya adalah:

3. B. Were

4. A

Jawaban yang nomor 4 itu mungkin typo yang sebenarnya "Was" jadi "War"
